member.name: T:BookPubDB.Repositories.AuthorRepository
member.summary: Repository for handling CRUD operations related to the Author entity.
member.remarks: This class provides methods for creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting authors. It extends from the generic Repository class, which contains common functionality.

member.name: M:BookPubDB.Repositories.AuthorRepository.CreateAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new Author in the database.
member.param: The database context used to interact with the database.
The data to create a new author, serialized in JSON format.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the created Author object.

member.name: M:BookPubDB.Repositories.AuthorRepository.GetByIdAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves an Author by its ID from the database, including its associated Books.
member.param: The database context used to interact with the database.
The ID of the author to retrieve.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the Author object, or null if not found.

member.name: M:BookPubDB.Repositories.AuthorRepository.UpdateAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously updates an existing Author's information in the database.
member.param: The database context used to interact with the database.
The ID of the author to update.
The updated data of the author, serialized in JSON format.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the updated Author object or null in case of failure.
